snippet: To the Editor:    Re ''California's Tobacco Initiative'' (editorial, Oct. 8):     It seems hypocritical that California's anti-smoking initiative should be spearheaded by the film director Rob Reiner, since Hollywood is part of the problem....
lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Re ''California's Tobacco Initiative'' (editorial, Oct. 8): It seems hypocritical that California's anti-smoking initiative should be spearheaded by the film director Rob Reiner, since Hollywood is part of the problem.
abstract: John Modzelewski letter says high tax on cigarettes proposed in California, intended to curb teen-age smoking, would likely have unintended consequence of increasing interstate smuggling (Oct 8 editorial)

headline.main: Cigarette Tax Only Sounds Like a Good Idea; Hollywood's Role
